trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ponte Vedra
There were no other sightings in Ponte Vedra on or around September 26th 2013
Summary: black triangle 3 lights completely silent right over head have seen two before but this one was smaller.
divs: Sighting DetailsWalking dog around 2 a_m booked up in the sky install a light from far away as I got closer only saw 3 lights from under had came by very quietly not going very fast I say about 40 miles an hour cruise over our heads I stared up no noise no nothing headed towards the oceanI have seen two others in the past and they were in North Georgia but we're much larger and only saw them from the interstate and disappeared behind mountain ranges this one flew right over had three lights and was black
